TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 中华薹草 ( 原变种) zhong hua tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Terminal spike male. Female glumes oblong-lanceolate.
treatment.distribution: ● Shady places in valleys, rocky streamsides and grasslands; 200–1700 m. Fujian, Guangdong, Guizhou, Hunan, Jiangxi, Shaanxi, Sichuan, Yunnan, Zhejiang.
